info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Putnam and northeastern Allen Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leipsic, or near Ottawa, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ottawa and Glandorf around 705 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Columbus Grove, Pandora and Bluffton. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 133 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
